config.siddhiApp: define stream AcceptedOrderInfoStream (orderId string, userId string, userName string, location string, address string, email string, amount long);@store(type = 'rdbms', datasource = 'DEMO_DB')define aggregation OrderAggregation from AcceptedOrderInfoStream select userId, userName, location, count() as orders, sum(amount) as itemsOrdered group by userId, location aggregate every sec ... year;

queryData.query: from OrderAggregation within "{{timeFrom}}","{{timeTo}}" per '{{perGranularity}}s' select AGG_TIMESTAMP, sum(orders) as orders group by AGG_TIMESTAMP
